articles.author: Liam Doolan
articles.title: Sonic Superstars Includes "New Character" By OG Designer Naoto Ohshima - Nintendo Life
articles.description: "That Sonic, and his friends will have to face"
articles.content:
I'm excited for the new character! The 3d designs of everything we've seen so far look perfect imo. Looking forward to seeing 3d Fang/Knack design.
BTW its not just classic Amy design - if you sign … [+1175 chars]
